metadata.name: Stillbirth
metadata.description:
The Binding of Isaac : Stillbirth will be a mod/expansion containing new items, trinkets, pickups, floors, enemies, bosses, characters, challenges and an original soundtrack.
Stillbirth is a Community mod developed by Shisheyu's Twitch community.
Current Version : 1.2
28 Passive Items :
* Money = Luck * Brave Shoe * Technology 0 * Hot Pizza Slice * Blobby * Blind Pact * Solomon * Cataract * Bubble's Head * First Blood * Choranaptyxic * Ottid * 9 brand new boss items * Spidershot * Cricket's Tail * Soul Extension * White Candle * Kikazaru * Mizaru * Iwazaru
10 Active Items :
* Dad's Beer * Golden Idol * Medusa's Head * Portable Restock * Cricket's Paw * Blank Tissue * Magic Mirror * Encyclopedia * Explosive Banana * 3D Glasses
6 Trinkets :
* Chainmail * Krampus' Tooth * Green Cross * Torn Gloves * Rusty Crowbar * ?
3 Familiars : * Sun WuKong * Bomb Bum * Dionea Muscipula
And also 6 new curses, 5 new pills, and 4 new transformations to discover ! Furthermore, items are now in their respective item pools, you don't need to spawn them to test them anymore !
Be sure to check out @TBOI_Stillbirth on twitter for regular leaks, and updates about the mod !
